name: Can you Dig It?
description:
Can you Dig It?

You are the Drill and your task is to navigate the hyrid procedurally generatedd levels and dig as deep as you can. As you dig you will encounter obstacles that will push you up a few metres. How deep can you go before the time runs out?

Keyboard - Arrows/WASD, Jump - Spacebar, Drill - X

Game Controls - Left Stick, Jump - A Button, Drill - X Button
